story:
The Story Behind Confidence in a Can

Hi my name is Merry Lynch and I was one of the lucky ones. At a very young age I had the opportunity to meet Zig Ziglar,Wayne Dyer,Charles “Tremendous” Jones,Les Brown and then I began to follow others. The conclusion I drew between my own experiences and of these masterful speakers was the discussion I kept hearing about the same 30 or so words. These 30 words that I would hear over and over again in books, speeches, in what I was learning as well as in what I was training others on were powerful, yet there was something missing. It is too easy to revert back to our old ways of behaving, our old ways of being, that were not serving us. Something deeper needed to change.

My passion for understanding people took me to studying DISC behavioral profiles which uncover our innate and descriptive behaviors. I then layered in Emotional Intelligence to understand how our personal energy affects others not only in the workplace but in all walks of life. Early in my career I studied etiquette which discusses self-leadership and diversity. These interests, if you will, drove me to design a tool that could help people at all levels and all walks of life be present and emotionally available to those they serve.

 From owning businesses in the US and Europe, in working with diplomats, film stars to college students I began to notice a trend, a kind of common thread that was prevalent in many people (certainly not all, but many). This thread brought about anxiety, frustration, and confusion and in general a dissatisfaction for life no matter how much money or status they had. This common thread was a lack of self-confidence, a lack of self-leadership and emotional awareness which seemed to have a trickle down effect to those around them. I could watch and observe people running down the rabbit hole, making mountains out of mole hills, pointing the finger in the opposite direction. Going nowhere and feeling disillusioned. Generally just not present in their life.

It Was An Itch That Wouldn't Go Away


So I went back to these 30 words that I kept hearing from great leaders and philosophers and researched them further to uncover their original meaning through etymology (the study of the existence or beginning of language). I looked at each word and how it was originally used to carry us forward and influence others and joined each word with a poignant and powerful quote that I had collected over the years. 

Words have built, destroyed and aligned great countries, people and ideas. Napoleon Bonaparte renounced “Four hostile newspapers are more to be feared than a thousand bayonets.” The celebrated author and rabbi,Yehuda Berg states that “words are singularly the most powerful force available to humanity.”

With this knowledge in hand I dug deeper and married each word with a select set of questions. The questions are meant for the recipient to take a deep dive into the meaning to develop an emotional bond with the word that will be carried with them throughout the day and beyond.

That is when Confidence in a Can was born. Confidence in a Can – one day, one word, for 30 days. Bring focus, clarity, understanding and confidence back into your life. This game can be played alone, with a team, your family members, in a group, whatever works for you.

Creating confidence and regaining control of your life or having the courage to make some changes is going to require you to do something different, to be someone different. That is where Confidence in a Can comes in.

Change Your Words, Change Your Life


Each day for 30 days you set a daily intention. This might be how you want to show up in an interview, or how you need to be in a disciplinary conversation with an employee, or maybe in overcoming a challenge at home. Your intention might sound as simple as this: Today I will smile more or as challenging as Today I will confront my boss.

Intentions guide us to shape our lives rather than live my default and letting our unconscious and conscious minds influence us. Setting a daily intention brings about deliberate awareness. Intentions are about creating the life experience that you truly want while staying connected to your values and living a life joy.

Then grab the “can” -  give it a good shake  -  open it up and without peaking, pull out a disc  -  just one. Oh…and you can’t put it back if you don’t like it. I know who you are, just don’t do it. It’s perfect as it is. Now take a good look at YOUR WORD, flip the disc over and reflect on the corresponding quote. Reach for the instruction sheet that has the 3 questions for you to ponder throughout the day that will help you to dive deeper into self-reflection. Next place the disc where you can get to it easily throughout the day maybe in a jacket pocket or in your purse, some place easily accessible so that when your day seems to be spiraling out of control or you have gotten off course and need to come back to center you can just reach in your pocket or purse (just like grabbing your security blanket) and pull out the word.

Then ask yourself throughout the day, “If I was being _____________ right now how would this interaction or task turn out differently?" Stop, breathe, notice and be grateful. Thank yourself for noticing and then shift. Shift the way you are thinking, shift the way you are behaving, shift the way you are standing or being. Shift…something.

Believe it or not this is where the hard part comes in. Shifting is uncomfortable, doing something different from the way we have done it hundreds if not thousands of times before can be agonizing, awkward, or embarrassing. Sound like fun? Truthfully…not always. Some days some words will feel like fingernails on a chalk board and yet others will feel like a perfectly fitted suit.

With the hundreds of people that have test marketed this product you like them will be surprised the effect that a simple word can have on your day and ultimately your life. Change comes about by partnering with our sub-conscious instead of pushing against. The sub-conscious wants you to stay just where you are, it sees no need for change. Therein lies the problem. These reactions to the words are all perfect. 

By pulling yourself back to center you begin to regain control of your precious life. Get the chip off your shoulder and into your hand where you can begin to build a better life one word at a time.

Confidence in a Can, for yourself, your business, your family, a building block for your success. Begin to be the light in your life.

Rewards - something for everyone!


It's been a learning process putting all of the pieces together for this launch and I don't want to sound cliche but I am so grateful for this journey. Having successfully launched other product lines into the US market I see how valuable this process is and am even more convinced that now is the time to launch Confidence in a Can.

The rewards for supporting this launch are many. We have designed reward and support levels for all budgets and for each level of participation understanding that people need different tools to help facilitate change. From our research and test marketing this product around the US you can be sure that once you play this game your life will never be the same. To what degree, well, that's up to you!

Here is what is in store for you:

  • $5 – PDF Listing of words and questions from the Confidence in a Can game

  • $10 – E-book, How to be Merry, 365 tips on how to live an outrageous life!

  • $25 – 1 Confidence in a Can Game (savings of $4.95)

  • $75 – 2 Games, Daily Dose Workbook download (Meditations, Visualizations, Affirmations, Daily Action sheet) 
  • $120 – 5 Games (1 FREE Game)
  • $150 – 1 Game, 1 Emotional Intelligence Assessment, 1 hour Skype video chat strategy session ($280 value - 45% discount)
  • $250 – 5 Games, PDF Daily Dose Workbook, Webinar/E-Course of Confidence in a Can-opening the door to Emotional Intelligence ($300 value - you save 20%)
  • $1000 – 5 Games, ½ day in person workshop (travel & lodging expenses additional) (Workshop details: Confidence in a Can Emotional Intelligence Workshop) $1650 Value (40% discount)
  • $2000 – 10 Games, 1 full day in person workshop (travel & lodging not included) (Workshop details: Confidence in a Can Emotional Intelligence Workshop with Dynamic Communication Instruction) $3000 Value  (33% discount)
  • $2500 – 10 Games, 1 full day in person workshop, 10 Emotional Intelligence Assessments (travel & lodging expenses additional) (Workshop details: Confidence in a Can Emotional Intelligence Workshop and EI group report debrief, Dynamic Communication Instruction) $4000 Value (37% discount)
  • $3500 – 10 Games, 2 day in person live workshop, 10 Emotional Intelligence Assessments (travel and lodging expenses additional) (Workshop details: Confidence in a Can Emotional Intelligence Workshop and EI group report debrief, Sit, Stand, Smile What Your Body Language Is Telling Your Audience, Dynamic Communication, Your Collective Universe – visualization & goal setting) $6300 Value (45% discount)

*additional Confidence in a Can games can be added to any of the above rewards for the discounted price of $25 per game, shipping included. (Confidence in a Can regularly retails for $29.95, during this launch the game is discounted), please contact me for details.Everyone wins with the launch of Confidence in a Can. Support this product, purchase yours today and one for a friend in need. Let's make the world a better place one can at a time. Thank you!

Test Marketing and What We Need From YOU


In order to get Confidence in a Can to market we need to raise $10,000 and we can't do it without your support. The funds raised will go directly to the manufacturer in the US and then once completed will go to the fulfillment center and into your home or business. 

Having designed, manufactured and sold other products throughout the US and Europe my team and I are anxious for the success of this launch and to see the lives that will change because of this product. 

We have spent the last few years test marketing this product in a luxury department store in California, in networking groups and women's organizations as well as in private Facebook challenges. The kinks are gone and what remains is a transformative product for all ages and all demographics.

Risks & Challenges

We have been working tirelessly to deter any obstacles that might come our way. With experience in manufacturing and product development we believe we have crossed all the t's and dotted all the i's. With that being said the one date we are coming up against is Christmas. At the time of this launch we may run into a problem with Christmas deliveries however to combat that we have designed a special card that will have a Confidence in a Can disc inside stating their gift is on it's way. So although the ideal is to have the actual product in hand, should that not take place we have addressed the issue ahead of time.

Share the Love

There are ways in which everyone can help. In getting Confidence in a Can to market help shows up in all different ways. Here are a few ideas for supporting this product launch:

  • Click the share button and engage with your followers on Facebook, Twitter, Pintrest, LinkedIn or where ever else you use social media.
  • Get your holiday shopping complete in one quick order.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools for an easy shout out!
  • Share this with your networking and school groups.
  • Reach out to your HR department for workshop suggestions (they won't get any better price than right now!)

And that's all there is to it.

I looked at each word and how it was originally used to carry us forward and influence others and joined each word with a poignant and powerful quote that I had collected over the years. 
Words have built, destroyed and aligned great countries, people and ideas. Napoleon Bonaparte renounced “Four hostile newspapers are more to be feared than a thousand bayonets.” The celebrated author and rabbi,Yehuda Berg states that “words are singularly the most powerful force available to humanity.”
With this knowledge in hand I dug deeper and married each word with a select set of questions. The questions are meant for the recipient to take a deep dive into the meaning to develop an emotional bond with the word that will be carried with them throughout the day and beyond.


That is when Confidence in a Can was born. Confidence in a Can – one day, one word, for 30 days. Bring focus, clarity, understanding and confidence back into your life. This game can be played alone, with a team, your family members, in a group, whatever works for you.


Creating confidence and regaining control of your life or having the courage to make some changes is going to require you to do something different, to be someone different. That is where Confidence in a Can comes in.

Change Your Words, Change Your Life




Each day for 30 days you set a daily intention. This might be how you want to show up in an interview, or how you need to be in a disciplinary conversation with an employee, or maybe in overcoming a challenge at home. Your intention might sound as simple as this: Today I will smile more or as challenging as Today I will confront my boss.

Intentions guide us to shape our lives rather than live my default and letting our unconscious and conscious minds influence us. Setting a daily intention brings about deliberate awareness. Intentions are about creating the life experience that you truly want while staying connected to your values and living a life joy.
Then grab the “can” -  give it a good shake  -  open it up and without peaking, pull out a disc  -  just one. Oh…and you can’t put it back if you don’t like it. I know who you are, just don’t do it. It’s perfect as it is. Now take a good look at YOUR WORD, flip the disc over and reflect on the corresponding quote. Reach for the instruction sheet that has the 3 questions for you to ponder throughout the day that will help you to dive deeper into self-reflection. Next place the disc where you can get to it easily throughout the day maybe in a jacket pocket or in your purse, some place easily accessible so that when your day seems to be spiraling out of control or you have gotten off course and need to come back to center you can just reach in your pocket or purse (just like grabbing your security blanket) and pull out the word.
Then ask yourself throughout the day, “If I was being _____________ right now how would this interaction or task turn out differently?" Stop, breathe, notice and be grateful. Thank yourself for noticing and then shift. Shift the way you are thinking, shift the way you are behaving, shift the way you are standing or being. Shift…something.
Believe it or not this is where the hard part comes in. Shifting is uncomfortable, doing something different from the way we have done it hundreds if not thousands of times before can be agonizing, awkward, or embarrassing. Sound like fun? Truthfully…not always. Some days some words will feel like fingernails on a chalk board and yet others will feel like a perfectly fitted suit.
With the hundreds of people that have test marketed this product you like them will be surprised the effect that a simple word can have on your day and ultimately your life. Change comes about by partnering with our sub-conscious instead of pushing against. The sub-conscious wants you to stay just where you are, it sees no need for change. Therein lies the problem. These reactions to the words are all perfect. 
By pulling yourself back to center you begin to regain control of your precious life. Get the chip off your shoulder and into your hand where you can begin to build a better life one word at a time.
Confidence in a Can, for yourself, your business, your family, a building block for your success. Begin to be the light in your life.
Rewards - something for everyone!



It's been a learning process putting all of the pieces together for this launch and I don't want to sound cliche but I am so grateful for this journey. Having successfully launched other product lines into the US market I see how valuable this process is and am even more convinced that now is the time to launch Confidence in a Can.
The rewards for supporting this launch are many. We have designed reward and support levels for all budgets and for each level of participation understanding that people need different tools to help facilitate change. From our research and test marketing this product around the US you can be sure that once you play this game your life will never be the same. To what degree, well, that's up to you!
Here is what is in store for you:
$5 – PDF Listing of words and questions from the Confidence in a Can game

$10 – E-book, How to be Merry, 365 tips on how to live an outrageous life!
$25 – 1 Confidence in a Can Game (savings of $4.95)


$75 – 2 Games, Daily Dose Workbook download (Meditations, Visualizations, Affirmations, Daily Action sheet) 
$120 – 5 Games (1 FREE Game)

$150 – 1 Game, 1 Emotional Intelligence Assessment, 1 hour Skype video chat strategy session ($280 value - 45% discount)

$250 – 5 Games, PDF Daily Dose Workbook, Webinar/E-Course of Confidence in a Can-opening the door to Emotional Intelligence ($300 value - you save 20%)

$1000 – 5 Games, ½ day in person workshop (travel & lodging expenses additional) (Workshop details: Confidence in a Can Emotional Intelligence Workshop) $1650 Value (40% discount)

$2000 – 10 Games, 1 full day in person workshop (travel & lodging not included) (Workshop details: Confidence in a Can Emotional Intelligence Workshop with Dynamic Communication Instruction) $3000 Value  (33% discount)

$2500 – 10 Games, 1 full day in person workshop, 10 Emotional Intelligence Assessments (travel & lodging expenses additional) (Workshop details: Confidence in a Can Emotional Intelligence Workshop and EI group report debrief, Dynamic Communication Instruction) $4000 Value (37% discount)

$3500 – 10 Games, 2 day in person live workshop, 10 Emotional Intelligence Assessments (travel and lodging expenses additional) (Workshop details: Confidence in a Can Emotional Intelligence Workshop and EI group report debrief, Sit, Stand, Smile What Your Body Language Is Telling Your Audience, Dynamic Communication, Your Collective Universe – visualization & goal setting) $6300 Value (45% discount)


*additional Confidence in a Can games can be added to any of the above rewards for the discounted price of $25 per game, shipping included. (Confidence in a Can regularly retails for $29.95, during this launch the game is discounted), please contact me for details.Everyone wins with the launch of Confidence in a Can. Support this product, purchase yours today and one for a friend in need. Let's make the world a better place one can at a time. Thank you!


Test Marketing and What We Need From YOU


 In order to get Confidence in a Can to market we need to raise $10,000 and we can't do it without your support. The funds raised will go directly to the manufacturer in the US and then once completed will go to the fulfillment center and into your home or business. 
Having designed, manufactured and sold other products throughout the US and Europe my team and I are anxious for the success of this launch and to see the lives that will change because of this product. 
We have spent the last few years test marketing this product in a luxury department store in California, in networking groups and women's organizations as well as in private Facebook challenges. The kinks are gone and what remains is a transformative product for all ages and all demographics.
    
Risks & Challenges

 We have been working tirelessly to deter any obstacles that might come our way. With experience in manufacturing and product development we believe we have crossed all the t's and dotted all the i's. With that being said the one date we are coming up against is Christmas. At the time of this launch we may run into a problem with Christmas deliveries however to combat that we have designed a special card that will have a Confidence in a Can disc inside stating their gift is on it's way. So although the ideal is to have the actual product in hand, should that not take place we have addressed the issue ahead of time.
    Share the Love There are ways in which everyone can help. In getting Confidence in a Can to market help shows up in all different ways. Here are a few ideas for supporting this product launch:  Click the share button and engage with your followers on Facebook, Twitter, Pintrest, LinkedIn or where ever else you use social media.
Get your holiday shopping complete in one quick order. Use the Indiegogo share tools for an easy shout out!
Share this with your networking and school groups.
Reach out to your HR department for workshop suggestions (they won't get any better price than right now!)   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Genius Edu Labs , has done extensive survey on the challenges faced by schools in Setting up and managing traditional science laboratories.66% of schools in India & majority of African countries cannot afford the space & construction costs as building basic classrooms itself needs huge funds.Our innovation- NANO SCIENCE LAB is a sleek looking low weight modular cabinet with wheels in the dimensions of 3ft h X 3ft l X 1.5ft d to store various lab apparatus & chemicals could address the above challenge.

What We Need & What You Get

For the first time in the history, A science teacher walks into the classroom with a NANO SCIENCE LAB to share the joy of practical learning. A school empowered with this solution can inspire a science teacher to perform better and plan his lessons with 80:20 (Practical:Theory)ratio.It ignites passion among students and inspires them towards scientific research & innovation.
We are raising $50000 to support 30 under privileged schools at the cost of $2000 per lab which is hardly 20% of  regular cost if they set up a traditional lab in school. We have designed perks to complement  your social commitment on every valuable contribution.Every Positive citizen can join hands to support this campaign by sharing this idea in their social network.
 The Impact
 This campaign helps to equip 30 schools with labs , empower  60 science teachers with an innovative skill  by  name attttributive teaching shared during a 3 day workshop and also inspire 20,000 students over next 5 years .We feel accomplished even  if 2% of inspired students opt careers towards scientific research & innovations.

Risks & Challenges

Our challenges in building a strong reach can be  leveraged by sharing your network with us.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can recommend this project to the schools near by or share this project on all major social media . Please remember that every contribution towards this project gives a great  impact on the society you are living.

story:
Who is SuperCyclingMan?

My name is Will Hodson. 

I am 38 years old and I used to work as a primary school teacher in London. 

One day at school, I read a book all about heroes to my class and I was so inspired by the message that we can all do heroic acts, big and small, that I decided to go for my dreams and attempt a round the world bike ride. 

And so, from May 2015 to January 2020, I will be pedalling across all 7 continents (even Antarctica) wearing my own SuperCyclingMan costume. 

I have 3 main goals:

  1. To complete a record-breaking 100,000km cycle around the world
  2. To raise £100,000 for charity
  3. To inspire 100,000 children worldwide by visiting schools along the way

Even superheroes need help sometimes...

This gigantic journey is almost entirely self-funded. I have no corporate sponsorship and I have sold everything valuable that I own to get started. 

On 16th October 2015 I arrived in Istanbul having cycled 8000km from London. Continent 1 (EUROPE) complete!

I am now embarking on continent 2 - ASIA. 

I currently have enough money to get me to India - roughly half way across the continent.

Can you help keep this world cycle attempt going and help me get all the way to Tokyo...and beyond? I am living as cheaply as I can - simple food and camping or staying with local families for free. There's no fancy restaurants and hotels! 

SuperPerks!

If you can help keep my world cycle going with a donation of any size, I have come up with some really unique perks to say thank you. The perks are so good in fact, I'm calling them SuperPerks! 

How would you like a handwritten postcard from every continent on the planet, for example? 

Or maybe, you would like me to write your name and your own message on one of my bags that I will take with me all around the world over the next 5 years?

#WeCanAllBeHeroes

Here is a small selection of comments from people who are enjoying the adventure so far...
"Our daughter is loving learning Geography with you." (Primary school parent, UK)
"The children have really taken to your idea that #WeCanAllBeHeroes. Thank you for the inspiration." (Primary School teacher, Belgium.)
"Your emails and posts brighten up those occasional GroundHog Days" primary school parent.
Please help keep me going on this record-breaking ride around the planet, raising £100,000 for charity and inspiring young minds with the message that #WeCanAllBeHeroes

story:
Mindful Beauty is a natural cosmetic company based in Ireland that has now also trained nearly 2500 people through our mindfulness meditation programs through our training company Learning to Exhale. Our social enterprise has completed training in ten HSE hospitals and has been offering mindfulness training to communities at a significantly reduced rate. Our natural and award winning cosmetics are available from over 600 stores.

 

We now wish to send 250 HSE nurses our Mindful Beauty Nurses Gift Box who are working on the COVID frontlines with this crowdfund campaign. We are looking for 250 people to sponsor a Nurses Gift Box and we will send it directly to them for you.

 

We have the addresses and contact details of 1000 HSE nurses we have trained, so we could with your support get one thousand of our Nurses Gift Boxes out to them before Christmas with your generosity and with enough backers.

You will make a big difference to a nurse by sponsoring a box.

You will help her sleep, sooth her feet, relieve her aches and pains and protect her from the flu with our nurses box.

Some Irish hospitals are beginning to enter crisis points with the strain COVID is placing on medical staff and services. Self-care is very important as a nurse but even more so in this time. This is one way as a nation we can encourage nurses in terms of self-care.

If we exceed the funding goal we will also organise more Mindful Beauty Spa Days which we already sponsor for HSE nurses. If we super exceed the goal we will also run Mindful Beauty Self Esteem & Self Compassion Workshops for vulnerable teens who have been referred to see a psychiatrist and many of whom have been waiting up to two years to see one.

If you would like to purchase one of our gift boxes for yourself here you will still be contributing to Mindful Beauty Day for HSE nurses and helping teens in crisis and getting yourself, family and friends a treat from our range of gift boxes!

 

We can send your box to you, your family of friends anywhere in Europe through our contracted courier company. As soon as you pay for your box on this crowdfunder we will start preparing boxes for dispatch immediately. When the fundraiser closes all the boxes we aim to dispatch all boxes on the 11th of Dec to reach destinations by the 20th of Dec. We cannot ship to anywhere outside of the European Union but can to anywhere within: Ireland, UK, France, Spain, Italy, Germany, The Netherlands and so on.

We have now taken over 160 HSE nurses, for FREE, to Mindful Beauty Spa Day that we sponsor consisting of hot stone massage, reflexology, facials, Indian head massage and manicures. We also sponsor all the products used. How fab is that!? If we surpass the campaign goal, we will try and run as many as we can of these Spa Days throughout the country with a portion of the funds.  Check it out here...

 

Francis Lanuza BS Arch our Marketing Director said, ‘The Mindful Beauty crowdfunder is a great opportunity for Irish people to find a way to directly thank nurses on the frontline by sponsoring our Nurses Gift Boxes which will then be sent to them for Christmas. Also to support a social enterprise that has spent a number of years empowering HSE nurses in Irish hospitals and people in local communities. All the products are made in Ireland in small batches. Imagine how much more we could do with some funding from the public?’ So go fund us. Back us to do more of this life changing work with people in Ireland and further afield.

In fact, one nurse who was given a place on mindful Beauty Spa Day told a HSE Director it was the nicest thing the HSE nurses ever got.  Studies have shown that nurses who feel appreciated and valued suffer less burnout.

 

Now more than ever do these nurses need protection from burnout and compassion fatigue; being on the frontlines of COVID and giving quite selfless service while actually putting their own lives at risk. So by people purchasing a Nurses Gift box they are sending a direct message to the HSE nurses working on the frontlines and if they buy a gift box from our range for themselves on the crowdfunder they are also contributing to more Mindful Beauty Days for HSE nurses.  

Over 30,000 NHS staff are now either sick with COVID or self-isolating. A number of HSE hospital are reaching a critical point with COVID too. Here is your chance to contribute something if you are not in healthcare but support the staff.

If we don’t look after the nurses, who will be there to look after us?

Our mindfulness students have been able to reduce their stress levels, return to normal sleeping patterns, heal, transform, reduce blood pressure and empower themselves. As a result of the training they have an extra protection from some of the worst effects of stress; cancer, heart disease, depression and nervous breakdowns. Some have even saved their marriages.

Everybody who does the course repeatedly scores us 10/10 and we have over 1000 rave reviews.

Lots of our students are nurses and they have learned a life skill through learning LTE mindfulness meditation to protect them from; stress, burnout and compassion fatigue.

We have been studied by an independent researcher at The University of Galway for one year. They saw that our training programs significantly reduce stress levels and significantly increase compassion. This is a unique evidence based European study.

Mindfulness meditation is being shown more and more to have a positive benefit on all areas of society where its practised and implemented; healthcare, education, leadership and many, many workplaces.

 

We have four social aims in the work we do with Mindful Beauty;

improve standards of mindfulness practice

increase compassion, self compassion and self esteem in society

enhance relationship experience & quality of life

effect profound healings and transformations

Looking at the feedback forms from our clients we can tell you we are well on our way to achieving all of the above. Check out testimonials click here Learning to Exhale Testimonials - Mindfulness

"The course has helped make sense of the numbness I was feeling - understand that I was shutting myself off from loved ones and life. I realized how critical I am of myself and understand how much a waste of energy that is. My self-esteem is improving, keen to keep walking on." - Sharon

"Wonderful experience, feel light!" - Geraldine

"I feel like I have woken up, I have taken ownership and control back in my life. It has not only helped me but my family." - Emma

"It has enriched my life, mindfulness is definitely an energizing experience.   I believe it will help me love and appreciate myself and what I have." - Anne Marie

"Gave me inner calmness, focus, helped me to put my problems
into perspective." - Simon

Who We Are - Healer & Social Architect

Our founder is best-selling author and health Guru Ralph Quinlan Forde. He wrote The Book of Tibetan Medicine which is now in 11 languages. Ralph does all the training instruction and has been featured on BBC, RTE, Newstalk and many newspapers & magazines. Francis Lanuza is an artist architect turned social architect who has created all our graphics, designed & created our labels and is our top sales person. With your funding we could have some more light warriors here. We need about 10.

As part of how we try and fund ourselves we have launched a range of artisan cosmetics made with high quality aromatherapy essential oils and soothing natural Atlantic seaweed. Our founder used to work as a biotechnologist at The Body Shop HQ. These products have proven very popular when we have sold them at different festivals around Ireland. Ralph uses all his knowledge of herbal medicine, biotechnology, aromatherapy, Ayurveda & Tibetan Medicine, cosmetology and the latest skin science to make these products. Everyone says they are fantastic!

There is 800 million Euros of cosmetics imported into Ireland each year where we are based. We would like to have some of this market and with the revenue run more of our courses that benefit more communities.

We would like to expand our brands success to get into retail chains all over the world and with your funding we will be able to accomplish this and become sustainable and offer even more training programs that help empower more people as a result. Plus reach more communities in more countries.

Discover Your Beautiful Mind With Us.

Even if you are not in a position to purchase a box for a nurse or yourself you can still help by sharing this information on your social media pages and telling your friends about it.

Use all the share tools here on Indiegogo to spread the message about this crowdfund invitation.

story:
The Homeschool Classroom Playground

Hi! I'm Rebecca Cohen, Head Teacher at The Homeschool Classroom in Santa Fe, a small school for children ages 5-14.  We have been serving Homeschool Families in Santa Fe for the past 10 years.  It is a scientific fact that kids learn easier, faster and retain more information, IF they have physical activity during the learning day.  The Homeschool Classroom has a large field for a play area, however it is filled with gravel, goatheads (sharp and dangerous plants) and holes in the ground.  we are in GREAT NEED of a SAFE running space for our kids.  With Covid-19 inspiring many more families to Homeschool their children, our services are greater demand.  We have a great big outdoor tent for moving the lessons outside, however our running space needs improvement.  

www.thehomeschoolclassroomsantafe.com

We need a SAFER RUNNING SPACE FOR KIDS! 

THIS ENTAILS:

  • $6000 for artificial grass (No fancy playground equipment needed, just a safe, flat ground for running) 
  • $3000 to pay for installation

Kids NEED to run in order to LEARN! 

This is a fact.  Kids who have had their PE classes taken away in regular Elementary Education classrooms, tested poorly and were unable to retain information presented throughout the day.

  • With gravel, goatheads and glitches in the ground, kids have fallen and been injured.  The last injury resulted in three stitches on a child's LIP!  
  • What do kids' LOVE about coming to learn at The Homeschool Classroom???? PLAYTIME! Let's help make their playtime SAFE! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please get the word out that we need some artificial turf for our playground.  Please share this campaign with anyone you know that cares about kids and can help us in any way make this goal an achievement!

story:
UPDATE:

You may have seen us on stage battling it out at TechCrunch Disrupt's Startup Battlefield 2020!

 

 

 

Reduce your child's screentime

Kids spend 6 hours per day in front of screens! This has only gotten worse during COVID.

 

Studies show that too much screentime causes long-term damage to kids.

 

Even Steve Jobs protected his kids from screens.

 

Meet Kiri

Kiri is a tech-forward smart wooden block for ages 1 and up. Built on Montessori principles, it teaches languages, STEM, and an expanding library of subjects, all without a screen. It's super fun, super intuitive, and we need you to help us make it happen! 

 

How it works

 
 

 

 

 

 

Kiri solves that problem, and more:

 

Our community

Kiri is loved by kids, parents, teachers, human development experts, speech therapists & many many more...

 

Kiri is fun for all children!

 

Inspiration from a millennia-old toy

The original wooden block encouraged learning through play: teaching letters, numbers, creativity and more. This humble toy served as our inspiration -- we just decided to make it a little smarter. 


 

 

Simply place the block on a tile and watch what happens!

 

 

Light: The block’s LED light will glow indicating its contact with a tile. If the tile is the color blue, the light will glow blue

Sounds: The block’s speaker will make a noise. If the tile is a picture of a cat, the block will say “cat” 

Physical play: is required and increases awareness and attention in children.

 

Kiri allows your child to learn and practice languages, from the most basic to advanced levels. Kiri comes with English, Spanish, and Mandarin Chinese already built-in. And we plan to progressively add new languages in the future.

Each tile pack supports all 3 languages as soon as you open the box - there's nothing you need to do. Just tell Kiri what language you want, then play.

Through play, your child will learn skills such as counting, animals, and basic phrases in 3+ languages.

This tile gives you the ability to change the blocks mode from English, Spanish, Chinese and between explore and game mode.

 

Optional Smart Subscription

Kids grow and develop quickly and so should their lessons. When you sign up for our Kiri subscription, we’ll send you a new curated pack of tiles each month, providing an entirely new set of lessons and games to experience.

 

There are dozens of tile packs available in an expanding library of subjects. Numbers, animals, shapes, and math, just to name a few.

We'll continue to add new packs - the options are nearly endless. We love suggestions too, so please message us and let us know which packs you'd love to see next. (A few backers have already sent us some great ideas.)

 

 

 

Kiri is designed and built on Montessori principles.  

 

Repetition: “Repetition is the secret of perfection.” Kiri quizzes give kids fun and instant feedback on what they’ve learned.

Child-Centered: Each child learns at their own pace. Kiri packs fits perfectly into your children's development cycle.

Hands-on Learning: Children learn through their senses. Kiri teaches children critical skills through play.

Montessori Materials: Inspired by classic wooden blocks, Kiri is made from natural materials providing a calming, environment.


 

Includes 2 tile packs

Once you purchase, you'll be able to choose 2 of the following tile packs as part of your Kiri Starter Pack. We'll send you a survey at the end of the campaign to let us know your choices.

 

Over the past 2 years, we've tested Kiri with hundreds of people and the response has been overwhelmingly positive. Kiri is loved by:

  • Parents
  • Kids
  • Teachers
  • Guidance counselors
  • Speech therapists
  • Parents of special-needs children
  • Children with autism

 

For children of all abilities

Kiri was uniquely created for children of all learning abilities. We spent hours collaborating with parents and children with different abilities in order to help it meet the needs of this unique and special community.

Kiri is able to teach children with Autism, Down Syndrome, Developmental Delays, Learning Disabilities, and more. Its approachable look and friendly voice promote speech development, cognitive development, manipulative dexterity and much more! 

For our nonverbal friends, Kiri can even become the voice to express their needs.

 

Eco-friendly

Kiri is made using natural materials, meaning you're not adding to the plastic toy collection.

 

 

Kiri is the Japanese name for the fastest growing tree in the world, the paulownia or "princess tree". In Japan, it was once customary to plant a Kiri tree when a baby girl was born. The girl and the tree would grow until she reached the age of marriage, at which point the tree would be cut down and used to make a dowry chest for her family.

We believe that small childhood investments will have a big impact on the future. From early concepts like color identification and fine motor skills to more advanced concepts like languages, memorization, and mathematics, Kiri will grow with your child.

 

We are Harvard, Stanford, and BYU-trained engineers, designers, teachers & entrepreneurs.

When we started building Kiri nearly 2 years ago, we set out to create something that’s versatile, adaptive, grows with your child, and - most importantly - fun.

Our goal is to provide the best learning toy your child will ever use and are committed to this promise. This crowdfunding campaign is only the first step in our plan to reach that goal, and we will continue to add more packs and other products to pair with the Kiri block to enhance learning and fun! 


Follow Us

Follow us on Instagram

Follow us on Facebook

 

 

The 21st-century wooden block

Kiri is made with the latest technologies, including:

  • Custom PCB (printed circuit board)
  • Processor
  • Memory
  • Accelerometer
  • Bluetooth
  • Battery
  • LED
  • Mini-USB port

 

 

Shipping is a process and has the potential to cause problems if not handled correctly. We aim to provide you with the best prices. The cost of shipping is based on your shipping address and will be added to your order. This is at cost, so we won't make any money from it. We will always keep shipping information transparent and work hard to make the process as easy as possible.

For international buyers, you are responsible for any customs fees. We recommend you find out about your customs regulations and fees, so you can receive your Kiri hassle-free.

 

Risks and challenges

We have a high-fidelity prototype and are working with our manufacturer to bring Kiri to life but we need your help in order to fulfill the quantity required. COVID is a risk and may cause disruptions to our global supply chain. Because we have designed a system instead of a one-off product, we will be diligent in overseeing the production of each piece.

 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

Unlike most toys that are only useful for a very short time and for one specific use, Kiri is highly versatile and adaptable, ensuring it can be useful for many years. Kids can start using Kiri at age 1 and continue all the way to age 6+ since lessons gradually increase in difficulty and adapt to the child's development. We ensure Kiri will still be ready to use for years to come by using only high-quality durable materials: real solid wood, durable card stock, and cotton cases.

Reusability and recyclability

We plan to offer take-back programs and allow users to receive a discount on upgrades if they return the original unit with free return shipping.

Sustainable materials

Plastic toys are a major contributor to plastic pollution. We use natural and sustainable materials: our blocks are wood, tiles are durable card stock, and all carrying cases and totes are cotton.

Eco-friendly factories

The manufacturing partner we contracted with has a detailed plan for how to minimize its impact on the environment, including reducing its carbon footprint and limiting the materials it uses during manufacturing.

Sustainable distribution

We plan to use a fulfillment service that has several locations in different geographical regions of the US to ensure individual deliveries travel the least possible distances, minimizing our carbon footprint.

Sustainability is built into our core

Kiri was built from scratch to be environmentally-friendly and sustainable because of the adverse impact most toys (which are made from plastic) have on the environment. Sustainability is built into its core. Our goal was to build the best toy that is naturally-simple and aesthetically-pleasing to fit within the modern home.

story:
Introducing a newly invented 3D puzzle: C-Maze

Want to improve your spatial-thinking skills? Challenge yourself or someone you know? Try C-Maze!

C-Maze is a 3D dynamic maze puzzle. Imagine covering a cube with a maze. Then break the maze into six parts and make each part rotatable independently. Now it becomes C-Maze!

The goal is to move an indicator from a starting position to a finish position by finding a continuous path through six rotatable faces.

Please check out the videos above (multicolor version and single color version) to see how it works. Note the moving piece can be in different shapes and the standard package includes three moving pieces: the bear, the portable, and one more moving piece.

(The face panels in the pictures and videos are 3D printed, actual products will be smoother.)

It is not just one puzzle, there are 15 puzzles in total!

All six face panels of C-Maze can be swapped with one another, creating a total of 15 puzzles with different difficulty levels.

No matter how you arrange the six face panels, the puzzle is always solvable.

Future releases of new face panels

We plan to have future releases of new face panels that you can use on C-Maze. For example, adding a 7th face panel can create 75 new puzzles in addition to the current 15.

These new face panels can either make the current C-Maze easier or more challenging.

C-Maze comes with a variety of colors!

Pick your favorite color or a combination of all colors.

Play C-Maze by yourself or with friends!

C-Maze is not just to find a path. Each of those 15 puzzles has its own minimal steps to go from the beginning to the end. You can figure it out all by yourself, find a solution with your friends, or challenge them using the shortest time.

We will disclose the minimal steps required for each puzzle when we release C-Maze.

C-Maze is all made in the USA!

We have partnered with a local injection molding company to manufacture all C-Maze puzzles in New York. We are currently at the production stage. Check out the photo below for one of the molds.

Expect this cool puzzle in March 2021!

C-Maze is Fully Patented!

US Patent number is 10780341.

Indiegogo is the only place you can purchase C-Maze for the moment.

story:
Help Us Use Advanced Tech to Disrupt African Education

We are iCog Labs -- an Artificial Intelligence Research company located in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, in the horn of Africa,   Our AI R&D work has inspired us to create a revolutionary educational tablet for children without access to quality education, or without access to school at all.

We are not bystanders  aiming to swoop in and solve a problem we don't fully understand.   We all have lived through the problem we are aiming to fix!  We know what the African primary school education system lacks and we know the negative consequences this has resulted in for our nation.

In 2014 we began building the YaNetu, an AI-based teaching tablet aimed at African children.   We started the project in our spare time, without any funding, because we feel it is something that needs to be done.

Now we are seeking to raise funds to complete the project with the professionalism, polish and sophistication that the children of Africa deserve.  We are seeking $90,000 to enable us to hire a full-time staff of 10 programmers, artists and curriculum designers to work for a year on the project at our Addis Ababa office.

We Are Creating...

  • An Android-based teaching tablet for primary school age children in the developing world, with both offline and online applications 
  • A built-in curriculum, customized with local languages, designed to grow and develop over the years along with the child
  • Artificial Intelligence systems, represented by human-like avatars, designed in collaboration with leading American AI researcher Dr. Ben Goertzel.   Our AI avatars offer the student not only information and coaching, but also emotional and motivational feedback.

Hear iCog co-founder Dr. Ben Goertzel and iCog software developer Tensae Birhan share their thoughts on the YaNetu Teaching Tablet and its importance for African children:


We are also one of the official teams competing in the Global Learning XPRIZE.

If our Yanetu AI Teaching Tablet wins the $10M Grand Prize of the Global Learning XPrize, or one of the $1M runner-up prizes, we will put the funds obtained toward further development and deployment of AI-based teaching hardware and software for children in the developing world.  

The XPrize provides an exciting possibility for leveraging your donations.  If a dollar you donate helps us win a $10M prize, your dollar is buying a lot more than a dollar. However, while we believe we are very serious competitors for the prize, our project is not predicated on winning the Global Learning XPrize.  We began working on YaNetu before the Global Learning XPrize was launched, and once the product is completed,we intend to deploy it in Ethiopia and then spread it throughout Africa, no matter what.  We are already in discussions with local educational officials about deployment strategies throughout rural Ethiopia.

We at iCog Labs thank you tremendously for your valuable help.  We know that you are not indifferent to the existing education system in the developing nations, and to the dire fate of millions of out-of-school children. Your contribution is a testimony for us that the world can solve the biggest of its problems through unity. 


Need a Little More Background?

The situation for sub-Saharan African children is difficult in many ways, especially in rural areas. Yet things are far from hopeless. Many African economies, like Ethiopia’s are growing rapidly, meaning that new opportunities for skilled and educated young Africans are multiplying. Children increasingly see the value of acquiring advanced knowledge and skills; and teachers and parents, in spite of their sometimes limited educational backgrounds, are generally eager to help children learn and grow.  But the available tools and knowledge are often not adequate to aid students, teachers and parents in fulfilling their educational goals.

This is where the YaNetu comes in. It is a tool for introducing progressive education based curricula and intelligent personalized tutoring, customized for local language and culture, into the homes and the schools of those children who most need it.

Local development of the technology, guided by international advisory expertise on progressive education curriculum and advanced AI, will help ensure the product is shaped and refined in a way that works for local children in the local context.

The pilot project testing the initial prototype will span urban and rural Ethiopia, with 50 students receiving YaNetu in each of the Addis Ababa City Administrative State and the Amhara Regional State. The latter is an especially needy area; according to the Census report, 62% of the 7.1 million children in the Amhara Regional State are not in school. 20 other students will be identified in each district as control groups to enable scientific study of the Teaching Tablet’s impact.

The iCog team will offer training to school teachers and administrators, including hands-on instruction with the hardware and software, and more general instruction on importance of creative and progressive education for primary school-age children.


Technology and Curriculum

Hardware-wise, YaNetu will consist of an existing low-cost touch-screen tablet utilizing a customized version of the Android OS system.  It will come with a custom physical case and headset with speakers and microphone included, and also with a Hybrid Solar Powered Charger, so that children can work on language and math and other skills at home as well as at school. While it will not assume Internet connectivity for basic operations, it will be able to download additional curricular materials as they are developed when internet access is available.

The focus of the Teaching Tablet will be solely educational, focused on presenting students with quality curriculum and an emotionally meaningful experience; verbal, textual, visual, and always interactive. YaNetu’s user interface will be centered on a “virtual teacher” animated character, who will carry out simple interactions with the child in their native language (initially Amharic, the native language of the area where the initial trials will occur then grow to include additional customization of local languages in East Africa and other parts of the world).  The virtual teacher will provide the child with support and positive feedback and guide them through the curriculum. 

Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology will be deployed to enable the virtual teacher to address the child by name, remember basic facts about their life, and personalize the curriculum based on the child’s observed interests, strengths and weaknesses.  The core AI capabilities required here have already been developed at iCog Labs in the course of our software consulting work for international customers during 2013-14; iCog is already working on customizing these technologies for use in YaNetu.

The curriculum will include materials developed collaboratively with local educators, focusing on local issues and on preparing children for national examinations. It will also include progressive education oriented materials focused on creative learning, developed in conjunction with international child-centered education experts. Health information and curricula will be especially valuable, along with English, mathematics and science. For example, initial health applications will emphasize cleanliness, hand-washing, the importance of clean water, etc.

Education is truly the most powerful force in the world.


As these children grow up, the educations they have given themselves, with the help of their parents, their teachers and YaNetu, will help them bring their nations into the 21st century in an emphatic and exciting way. 


Lets make this thing happen! Share this with your friends and those who can make a difference!

are also one of the official teams competing in the Global Learning XPRIZE. 
If our Yanetu AI Teaching Tablet wins the $10M Grand Prize of the Global Learning XPrize, or one of the $1M runner-up prizes, we will put the funds obtained toward further development and deployment of AI-based teaching hardware and software for children in the developing world.   The XPrize provides an exciting possibility for leveraging your donations.  If a dollar you donate helps us win a $10M prize, your dollar is buying a lot more than a dollar. However, while we believe we are very serious competitors for the prize, our project is not predicated on winning the Global Learning XPrize.  We began working on YaNetu before the Global Learning XPrize was launched, and once the product is completed,we intend to deploy it in Ethiopia and then spread it throughout Africa, no matter what.  We are already in discussions with local educational officials about deployment strategies throughout rural Ethiopia.We at iCog Labs thank you tremendously for your valuable help.  We know that you are not indifferent 
to the existing education
system in the developing nations, and to the dire fate of millions of 
out-of-school
children. Your contribution is a testimony for us that the world can 
solve the
biggest of its problems through unity.  
Need a Little More Background?
The situation for
sub-Saharan African children is difficult in many ways, especially in rural
areas. Yet things are far from
hopeless. Many African economies, like
Ethiopia’s are growing rapidly, meaning that new opportunities for skilled and
educated young Africans are multiplying. Children increasingly see the value of acquiring advanced knowledge and
skills; and teachers and parents, in spite of their sometimes limited
educational backgrounds, are generally eager to help children learn and
grow.  But the available tools and
knowledge are often not adequate to aid students, teachers and parents in
fulfilling their educational goals.
This is where the YaNetu comes in. It is a tool for introducing progressive
education based curricula and intelligent personalized tutoring, customized for
local language and culture, into the homes and the schools of those children
who most need it.
Local development of the technology, guided
by international advisory expertise on progressive education curriculum and
advanced AI, will help ensure the product is shaped and refined in a way that
works for local children in the local context.
The pilot project testing the initial prototype will span urban and rural Ethiopia, with 50 students receiving YaNetu in each of the Addis Ababa City Administrative State and the
Amhara Regional State. The latter is an especially needy area; according
to the Census report, 62% of the 7.1 million children in the Amhara
Regional State are not in school. 20
other students will be identified in each district as control groups to enable
scientific study of the Teaching Tablet’s impact.
The iCog team will offer training to school
teachers and administrators, including hands-on instruction with the hardware
and software, and more general instruction on importance of creative and progressive education for primary school-age children.
Technology
and Curriculum
Hardware-wise, YaNetu will consist of an existing low-cost touch-screen tablet utilizing a customized version of the
Android OS system.  It will come with a custom physical case and headset with speakers and microphone included, and also with a Hybrid Solar Powered Charger, so that children can work on language and math and other skills at
home as well as at school. While it will not assume Internet
connectivity for basic operations, it will be able to download additional
curricular materials as they are developed when internet access is available. 
The focus of the Teaching Tablet will be
solely educational, focused on presenting students with quality curriculum and an
emotionally meaningful experience; verbal, textual, visual, and always
interactive. YaNetu’s user
interface will be centered on a “virtual teacher” animated character, 
who will
carry out simple interactions with the child in their native language
(initially Amharic, the native language of the area where the initial 
trials
will occur then grow to include additional customization of local 
languages in East Africa and other parts of the world).  The virtual 
teacher will
provide the child with support and positive feedback and guide them 
through the
curriculum.  
Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology will
be deployed to enable the virtual teacher to address the child by name,
remember basic facts about their life, and personalize the curriculum based on
the child’s observed interests, strengths and weaknesses.  The core AI capabilities required here have
already been developed at iCog Labs in the course of our software consulting
work for international customers during 2013-14; iCog is already working on customizing these
technologies for use in YaNetu.
The curriculum will include materials
developed collaboratively with local educators, focusing on local issues and on
preparing children for national examinations. It will also include progressive education
oriented materials focused on creative learning, developed in conjunction with
international child-centered education experts.
Health information and curricula will be especially valuable, along with
English, mathematics and science. For
example, initial health applications will emphasize cleanliness, hand-washing,
the importance of clean water, etc.


Education is truly the most powerful force in
the world. 

As these children grow up, the educations they have given themselves,
 with the help of their parents, their teachers and YaNetu, will help 
them bring their nations into the 21st century
in an emphatic and exciting way.   

Lets make this thing happen! Share this with your friends and those who can make a difference!

story:
Short Summary

An unlikely group of individuals came together in the late 1990s to create a transformative and revolutionary education model. Focused on delivering a hands-on, and experiential learning model to students, Agastya International Foundation has been bridging the gap in the conventional, rote-based education system in India since 1999. 

 So far, we have directly impacted the lives of over 8 million underprivileged students and 200,000 teachers across 17+ states in rural India. This has been a feat that has left several social innovators, freethinkers, aspiring social entrepreneurs and development experts from around the world deeply interested to learn from the approach and methodology used.  

What was the approach taken? How was the approach defined and adapted to changing circumstances? What were the challenges faced? How were they solved? How did Agastya innovate? Can this model be replicated? What will it take to build such a system? 

Providing answers to these questions and beyond, the MurthyNAYAK Foundation, one of our friends and supporters, chronicled the journey of our organisation over the last 15 years in the book, Wisdom of Agastya.

We would like to share our fascinating journey and experience with the world and other aspirants who wish to create a similar impact. Support us in this endeavor of sharing our experience through this book, Wisdom of Agastya. Contribute to this crowdfunding project and take home the wisdom of building a better world! Join the movement! #WisdomofAgastya


What We Need & What You Get

We will be using the funds raised to publish 1000 copies of the book, Wisdom of Agastya. The publication will be shared with all the relevant audiences including contributors. 

We would like your contribution to this campaign to not just publish a global case study and share it with the world, but also join a movement of creative education. It is a general misconception that creative education is only for the rich. The Agastya model has been built to defeat that thought and take creative education to the masses of India. 

By publishing the book, Wisdom of Agastya that chronicles the 15 year journey of our organisation, we hope to carry the message of 'creative education for all' to the world. We wish to share our experience and lessons with other aspiring social entrepreneurs, social scientists and others interested in understanding what it takes to replicate such a model anywhere else in the world. 

Depending on the contribution made, the contributors will get the following rewards:

  • Make a contribution of $10 or less to see your name on our website along with a heart felt thank you note. 
  • Make a contribution of $25 to get  access to an e-copy of the Wisdom of Agastya along with a puzzle to creatively engage your mind. And also see your name on our website!
  • Make a contribution of $50 to get a paperback version of the Wisdom of Agastya along with a puzzle to creatively engage your mind. And also see your name on our website!
  • Make a contribution of $150 to receive a hard-bound edition of the Wisdom of Agastya and see your name mentioned on our website. But that's not all! Meet Team Agastya to understand how social entrepreneurship works and also share your feedback and input for the Agastya model of creative education!
  • Make a contribution of $750 to see your name on our website, receive a hard-bound edition of the Wisdom of Agastya, meet Team Agastya to understand how social entrepreneurship works and also share your feedback and input for the Agastya model of creative education! AND also get an exclusive experience of our 172 acre creative campus at Kuppam, Andhra Pradesh in India!*
  • Make a contribution of $1500 to see your name on our website, receive a hard-bound edition of the Wisdom of Agastya, meet Team Agastya to understand how social entrepreneurship works and also share your feedback and input for the Agastya model of creative education. Also, get an exclusive experience of our 172 acre creative campus at Kuppam, Andhra Pradesh in India AND meet the Chairman of Agastya for an exclusive chat to learn about what it takes to build a social enterprise!* 

The Impact

We hope to inspire more social entrepreneurs to create similar impact on the world. The book, Wisdom of Agastya, is our way of sharing our lessons with the world to inspire more to create a similar impact, making it a creative education revolution.

In the last 15 years, Agastya has sparked the lives of over 8 million underprivileged children and 200,000 teachers in India. We have done this, using the 3 A's of Agastya - Ah! Aha! and Ha-ha! by instilling the elements of curiosity, surprise and fun with learning for students and teachers, alike. 

Considering the inaccessibility to education in several rural parts of India, Agastya has developed a model that takes creative education to the students through its different programmes like Mobile Labs, Lab-on-a-bike, Lab-in-a-box, Techla Bike etc. We encourage you to join us in this creative education revolution and help us share it with the world. Join the movement!

Other Ways You Can Help

While contributing to this campaign is one way of joining the movement, you can also support us by sharing this campaign with your friends and family who would like to be a part of such an education revolution. You can help us get the word out. Share this campaign on social media and help us spread the joy of creative education for all  because we are in this together!


*T&C - Contributors will have to make their own travel arrangements to reach Kuppam, Andhra Pradesh in India.

story:
Short Summary

WHO AND WHAT IS A CAREGIVER.

A Caregiver also known as a personal care attendant,patient care assistant,personal support worker and home care aide who helps persons who are disabled or chronically ill with their activities of daily living(ADLs) whether within the home, outside the home, or both. They are certified and licensed person who can be employed in California and many other States. While there is no single definition or professional title for Caregivers, in general they may be distinguished as persons who carry out their work as an employee in contrast to relatives, friends and others who are unpaid for their caregiver activities.  Caregivers most often help with daily activities, such as helping the individual bathe, eat, prepare meals and maintain their home. Caregivers may also provide medication reminders, assist with transportation to appointments and assist with shopping. There are 2.1 million households in California with at least one person over 65 and  1000 people turn 65 each day, that’s over 3.5 million a year, the job outlook is recession proof and becoming a caregiver is the first step on the ladder to an ever growing career in Healthcare 

PROGRAM OVERVIEW

An online course to provide pathways to direct caregiver jobs for:

·  College Students seeking new types of work

·  High School Graduates looking for a career pathway

·  Adult Education students looking for skills to help family members and others

·  Incumbent workers looking to upgrade their skill

·  Work Investment Board individuals seeking a new type of work

A course developed to provide;

•  Educational flexibility

•  Advanced aide training in clinical and soft skills focused on home care

•  Manageable and meaningful steps to a career ladder

THE LECTUREs & SKILLS LAB PROVIDE

•  A core set of competencies;

·  Role of the personal and home care aide

·  Consumer rights, ethics, and confidentiality

·  Communication, cultural and linguistic competency and sensitivity, problem solving, behavior management, and relationship skills

·  Personal care skills

·  Health care support

·  Nutrition support

·  Infection control

·  Safety and emergency training

·  Training specific to an individual consumer’s needs 10.

·  Self-care

  • To have a better understanding of the role as a direct care worker.

  • To better able to stand up for the rights of my clients.

  • To understand what I can talk about and what should remain confidential.

  • To be better abled to assist clients with their personal care needs.

  • To better understand the difference in the limited and extensive levels of care and responsibilities to   function within the care plan for each client/patient.

  • Feel better prepared to put together well‐balanced meals for client(s).

  • Understand how germs are spread and how to prevent their spread.

  • Know how to respond in an emergency.

  • Know how important it is that care is individualized to each client.

  • Be better abled to help clients maintain or improve their ability to care for themselves.

  • To understand the need to communicate changes in the client’s condition and /or changes needed to the care plan.

Our Funding needs are $435,000 and will be used as described in our video above. Please contact us if you require more information

story:
EVERY PENNY RAISED WILL GO INTO THE PRODUCTION AND DISTRIBUTION OF THIS DOCUMENTARY.

 

You have the power to inspire change throughout the world, and it starts right here, right now.

 

The Problem:

If you have ever experienced depression, suicide, the care system, domestic abuse or drug addiction in your childhood and even in your adult life, you are one of thousands of children and adults to experience it on a daily basis.

You are one of the "statistics".

Not every child has the access to resources that will help them understand their experience better, give them hope, and inspiration that allows them to use their past as fuel to create a better and more successful future for themselves.

This is where this documentary comes in.

 

The Background Story:

Warren W Ryan was born and bred in a council estate in Greater Leyes, Oxford, surrounded by domestic abuse aimed towards him, his mother and his siblings.

He would go on to witness his mother's constant battle with drug abuse and subsequently he and his siblings were thrown into care.

They became "just another statistic".

As if this wasn't enough, Warren then went on to experience depression at a catastrophic level, leading to suicidal tendencies, self-destructive behaviour and a complete loss of love for the world. 

*Insert More About Warren's Story Here*

 

The Inspiring Bit:

Fast forward 15 years, and Warren "Inspire" Ryan now travels the world, empowering people from all walks of life to Live Life On Their Terms.

From small, intimate public speaking workshops, then to mid-sized public speaking events, and NOW organising the biggest self-development event of the year.

Warren's story has become a viral inspiration, teaching people from all walks of life that their past does NOT define their future, and that they can be anything they choose to, regardless of the difficulties they may have faced in their younger years, just as he has done himself.

 

Why Is This Documentary Important?

One of the fundamental set backs Warren discovered on his journey, is that there isn't a great deal of awareness surrounding these subject matters:

  • People are too afraid to deal with depression.
  • People look down upon those who have dealt with domestic abuse.
  • People dismiss those that have conquered a drug addiction.
  • People pay little attention to those struggling with suicidal thoughts.

With society choosing to ignore these life altering issues, this instills the false belief in the person experiencing them that the issues they face make them unworthy to society, let alone allow those experiences to empower them to tell their story and inspire others that they too can overcome anything with the right tools and resources.

 

What We Are Here To Achieve:

With this documentary, we plan to distribute as far and wide across the world as possible!

To run-down and impoverished areas, to care homes, to charities, to care workers, to young people where ever they may be, we WILL succeed in empowering a new generation of "statistics" who have chosen their own path in life, regardless of their background, to empower themselves and those around them.

 

Documentary films have the power to have a huge impact: "An Inconvenient Truth" created global awareness of climate change. "The End of the Line" helped force companies and governments to change their policies through screenings at the United Nations, the European Commission, and US House of Representatives.

 

"Warren W Ryan - Empowering The World" will change the way society deals with the experiences that hundreds of thousands of people are dealing with - RIGHT NOW.

 

What Will You See In This DocuFilm?

Warren will be taking you back to where it all started for him, visiting the locations where he was brought up, put into care and where he dealt with his depression and suicidal tendencies that cover various locations around the UK and America.

As well as interviews with the man himself, there will be interviews with the people involved in his life, from his siblings, his mother, his co-workers and friends at the time, as well as an inside look at the events he organises, the lives he's changed and his future ambitions to create a better life for everyone.

 

What Do We Need?

We have support from speakers and organisations all around the world for this documentary and it's message - ensuring we have a solid foundation for world wide distribution.

Now we need to raise the money to hire a professional film crew to start filming here in the UK and in America.

Thankfully, we have access to an award winning director and a team of professional cameramen and editors who resonate with our cause- but they have families to feed too, and the more we can support the teams who are supporting us, the more we can achieve together!

The target covers:

Hire of Cameras, lighting equipment, sound equipment, cameramen, sound person, lighting person, travel, accommodation when required, editor and editing suite, and marketing materials.

Currently, we are budgeting for the minimum amount we can get away with to produce this DocuFilm. If we exceed our goal, every penny raised will go back into the production and distribution of this important film - enabling us to make it even better, and get it seen by even more people. 

 

A Short Message From Warren Inspire Ryan:

"Through my life experiences thus far, I have learnt that nothing can hit you as hard as life itself.

Through all of my pain, my faith in God has kept me believing through the good and the bad; I’ve found and stayed on a straight and narrow path. I’ve had to make sacrifices from things I can live without to the people I love and mean everything to me.

I was born a leader, and to lead by example and show that no matter how bad your start in life may have been, there’s a way out.

Its all about your attitude.

Some people use their pain mountains and get into a cycle of self pity. To dream small is to be unrealistic; conditioning your mindset will allow you to leave a legacy one day. I found the cure to my depression in helping others. Making someone else’s life better gave my life meaning.

I would never want to change my past because it made me who I am today. I wish and plan to reach out to as many people as possible and impart the belief that THEY can truly change their circumstances.

Thank you."

Thank you for supporting this cause, you are changing lives.

If you would like to know more, please contact us directly and we'll be happy to talk to you!
